name: Just Normal Cats
description:
# Just Normal Cats

![Optifine or EMF-ETF](https://i.postimg.cc/7Lbrw6Py/Model-Mod-Needed.png)
**Optifine** or **ETF+EMF** Needed



This texture pack changes the texture and model of the cat to a better and new look
Also makes changes to the ocelot

## **Just Normal Cats [Plus]** adds Animations!
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/BjmviS2szbI" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
